body:
The command below works with GMT 6.0.0, but fails with the master branch.
```
gmt histogram  @v3206_06.txt -F -T250 -W0.25p -B -V -pdf plot 
```

Debug message:
```
gmtinfo [DEBUG]: Object ID 1 : Registered Data Table File v3206_06.txt as an Input resource with geometry Point|Line|Poly [n_objects = 2]
gmtinfo [DEBUG]: gmtapi_init_import: Added 1 new sources
gmtinfo [DEBUG]: GMT_Init_IO: Returned first Input object ID = 1
gmtinfo [DEBUG]: gmtapi_init_export: Passed family = Data Table and geometry = Point|Line|Poly
gmtinfo [DEBUG]: gmtapi_init_export: Added 1 new destination
gmtinfo [DEBUG]: GMT_Init_IO: Returned first Output object ID = 0
gmtinfo [DEBUG]: GMT_Begin_IO: Mode value 1 not considered (ignored)
gmtinfo [DEBUG]: GMT_Begin_IO: Initialize record-by-record access for Input
gmtinfo [DEBUG]: gmtapi_next_io_source: Selected object 1
gmtinfo [DEBUG]: Look for file v3206_06.txt in /Users/seisman/.gmt
gmtinfo [DEBUG]: Look for file v3206_06.txt in /Users/seisman/.gmt/cache
gmtinfo [DEBUG]: Found file /Users/seisman/.gmt/cache/v3206_06.txt
gmtinfo [DEBUG]: Look for file v3206_06.txt in /Users/seisman/.gmt
gmtinfo [DEBUG]: Look for file v3206_06.txt in /Users/seisman/.gmt/cache
gmtinfo [DEBUG]: Found file /Users/seisman/.gmt/cache/v3206_06.txt
gmtinfo [DEBUG]: Look for file v3206_06.txt in /Users/seisman/.gmt
gmtinfo [DEBUG]: Look for file v3206_06.txt in /Users/seisman/.gmt/cache
gmtinfo [DEBUG]: Found file /Users/seisman/.gmt/cache/v3206_06.txt
gmtinfo [INFORMATION]: Reading Data Table from file v3206_06.txt
gmtinfo [DEBUG]: GMT_Begin_IO: Input resource access is now enabled [record-by-record]
gmtinfo [DEBUG]: GMT_Begin_IO: Initialize record-by-record access for Output
gmtinfo [DEBUG]: gmtapi_next_io_source: Selected object 0
gmtinfo [INFORMATION]: Writing Data Table to memory reference supplied by pointer
gmtinfo [DEBUG]: GMT_Begin_IO: Output resource access is now enabled [record-by-record]
gmtinfo [DEBUG]: Source col types: (Number)
gmtinfo [DEBUG]: ASCII source scanned: Numerical columns: 1, Trailing text: N, Record type: Numerical only
gmtinfo [DEBUG]: GMTAPI: GMT_Put_Record (double) called before any segments declared
gmtinfo [DEBUG]: GMT memory: Initialize 2 temporary column double arrays, each of length : 0
gmtinfo [DEBUG]: GMT_End_IO: Input resource access is now disabled
gmtinfo [DEBUG]: Object ID 2 : Registered Data Table Memory Reference 7f8244c0b0a0 as an Output resource with geometry Point [n_objects = 3]
gmtinfo [DEBUG]: GMT_End_IO: Output resource access is now disabled
gmtinfo [DEBUG]: gmtapi_unregister_io: Unregistering object no 1 [n_objects = 2]
gmtinfo [DEBUG]: gmtapi_unregister_io: Unregistering object no 2 [n_objects = 1]
gmtinfo [DEBUG]: GMT memory: Free 2 temporary column arrays, each of length : 2097152
ERROR: Caught signal number 11 (Segmentation fault) at
0   libgmt.6.dylib                      0x000000010d4607c4 gmtinit_get_region_from_data + 2196
1   ???                                 0x0000000000000042 0x0 + 66
Stack backtrace:
0   libgmt.6.dylib                      0x000000010d311c45 sig_handler + 581
1   libsystem_platform.dylib            0x00007fff711005fd _sigtramp + 29
2   ???                                 0x0000000100000001 0x0 + 4294967297
3   libgmt.6.dylib                      0x000000010d4467aa gmtinit_determine_R_option_from_data + 554
4   libgmt.6.dylib                      0x000000010d445867 gmt_init_module + 12887
5   libgmt.6.dylib                      0x000000010d6635f4 GMT_pshistogram + 356
6   libgmt.6.dylib                      0x000000010d3308b1 GMT_Call_Module + 2001
7   gmt                                 0x000000010d309c45 main + 2325
8   libdyld.dylib                       0x00007fff70f07cc9 start + 1
```
title: gmt histogram crashes if -R isn't given
